mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from product where member_id = #{memberId} AND del IS NULL
select p.*, w.member_id as wish_member_id from product p left join wish w on p.product_id = w.product_id left join member m on w.member_id = m.member_id where p.del is null order by wdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into product(product_id, category_id, member_id, title, content, sdate, edate, price, photo, wdate) values((select LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(product_id) + 1, 1), 4, 0) from product p), ${category_id}, ${member_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{sdate}, #{edate}, ${price}, #{photo}, now());
mapper.update: update product set category_id=${category_id}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, sdate=timestamp(#{sdate}), edate=timestamp(#{edate}), photo=#{photo}, wdate=now() where product_id = ${product_id}
update product set state = b'1' where product_id = #{product_id}
update product set state is null where product_id = #{product_id}
